languages.text: "Отчасти". {n}Фактотум крякает, переминаясь с ноги на ногу.{/n} "Иногда они проскальзывают сквозь пальцы, потому что у нас нет информации от локальных стражей. Иногда мы вынуждены... закрывать глаза на неприглядное прошлое ради уникальных специалистов. Те же контрабандисты часто оказываются весьма удачным приобретением для команды Равора..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, иногда мы вынуждены брать лиц с... гхм... неприглядным прошлым из-за их специфических умений. Контрабандисты весьма опытны, когда дело касается управления пустотным кораблем".

languages.text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."
languages.original_text: "Отчасти". {n}Фактотум крякает, переминаясь с ноги на ногу.{/n} "Иногда они проскальзывают сквозь пальцы, потому что у нас нет информации от локальных стражей. Иногда мы вынуждены... закрывать глаза на неприглядное прошлое ради уникальных специалистов. Те же контрабандисты часто оказываются весьма удачным приобретением для команды Равора..."

traits.locale_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local enforcers. Sometimes we're forced to... turn a blind eye to an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Those same smugglers often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

Sometimes we're forced to... turn a blind eye to an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Those same smugglers often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

languages.text: 「ええ、まあ」{n}ジャンリスは咳払いをして、もじもじと身体を動かした。{/n}「地方の監視官から情報が届かず、見逃してしまうこともあります。あるいは、特殊なスキルを持つ人材を確保するために…過去の汚点に目をつぶらざるを得ないこともあるんです。例えば、ただの密輸業者でも、ラヴォアのクルーとしてかなり役に立つ人材になることもあるんです…」
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、まあ」{n}ジャンリスは咳払いをして、もじもじと身体を動かした。{/n}「地方の監視官から情報が届かず、見逃してしまうこともあります。あるいは、特殊なスキルを持つ人材を確保するために…過去の汚点に目をつぶらざるを得ないこともあるんです。例えば、ただの密輸業者でも、ラヴォアのクルーとしてかなり役に立つ人材になることもあるんです…」

languages.text: "Kısmen." {n}Janris, boğazını temizleyip kıpırdanmaya başlıyor."{/n} "Kimi zaman yerli dizdarlardan bilgi alamadığımız için araya kaynayanlar olabiliyor. Kimi zamansa niş uzmanları aramıza katabilmek adına o kişilerin nahoş geçmişlerini göz ardı etmek zorunda kalıyoruz. Hatta öyle ki sıradan kaçakçılardan bile Ravor'un mürettebatına değer katacak kişiler çıkabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

traits.locale_text: "Kısmen."{n}Janris boğazını temizler ve kıpırdanmaya başlar."{/n} "Kimi zaman yerli dizdarlardan bilgi alamadığımız için araya kaynayanlar olabiliyor. Kimi zamansa niş uzmanları aramıza katabilmek adına o kişilerin nahoş geçmişlerini göz ardı etmek zorunda kalıyoruz. Hatta öyle ki bazen sıradan kaçakçılardan bile Ravor'ın mürettebatına değer katacak kişiler çıkabiliyor."

languages.text: «Más o menos». {n}Janris carraspea y cambia la pierna en la que se apoya.{/n} «A veces se nos cuela alguno porque no recibimos información de las fuerzas del orden locales, y a veces tenemos que... pasar por alto un pasado menos pulcro para reclutar especialistas con talentos infrecuentes. Por ejemplo, muchos contrabandistas comunes resultan muy útiles al servicio de Ravor...».
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

traits.locale_text: «Más o menos». {n}Janris carraspea y cambia la pierna en la que se apoya.{/n} «A veces se nos cuela alguno porque no recibimos información de las fuerzas del orden locales, y a veces tenemos que... pasar por alto un pasado menos pulcro para reclutar especialistas con talentos infrecuentes. Por ejemplo, muchos contrabandistas comunes resultan muy útiles al servicio de Ravor...».

languages.text: “有时如此。”{n}詹里斯清了清嗓子，重心从一只脚移到了另一只脚。{/n}“有的时候，我们招募到的船员里确实有漏网之鱼，因为当局没有给我们提供信息。还有的时候，我们别无选择……为了吸纳特定领域的人才，我们只能忽略他们不太光彩的过去。比如说，即便是随处可见的走私犯，也常常会成为雷沃手下的得力干将……”
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

traits.locale_text: “有时如此。”{n}詹里斯清了清嗓子，重心从一只脚移到了另一只脚。{/n}“有的时候，我们招募到的船员里确实有漏网之鱼，因为当局没有给我们提供信息。还有的时候，我们别无选择……为了吸纳特定领域的人才，我们只能忽略他们不太光彩的过去。比如说，即便是随处可见的走私犯，也常常会成为雷沃手下的得力干将……”

languages.text: « En quelque sorte, {n}admet Janris en se dandinant, mal à l'aise.{/n} Parfois, nous ne sommes pas en mesure de les identifier, car nous ne disposons pas des informations des gardes planétaires locaux. D'autres fois, nous sommes contraints de... fermer les yeux sur le passé de certains spécialistes aux compétences particulièrement recherchées. Même un contrebandier de bas étage peut s'avérer un véritable atout au sein de l'équipage de Ravor... »
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."

traits.locale_text: « En quelque sorte, {n}admet Janris en se dandinant, mal à l'aise.{/n} Parfois, nous ne sommes pas en mesure de les identifier, car nous ne disposons pas des informations des gardes planétaires locaux. D'autres fois, nous sommes contraints de... fermer les yeux sur le passé de certains spécialistes aux compétences particulièrement recherchées. Même un contrebandier de bas étage peut s'avérer un véritable atout au sein de l'équipage de Ravor... »

languages.text: "Durchaus." {n}Janris räuspert sich und tritt von einem Fuß auf den anderen.{/n} "Ab und an schlüpfen sie durch die Maschen, weil wir keine Informationen der örtlichen Wächter haben. Manchmal sind wir gezwungen ... über eine unerfreuliche Vergangenheit hinwegzusehen, um einen Spezialisten zu rekrutieren. Selbst gemeine Schmuggler erweisen sich häufig als ausgesprochen nützlich für Ravors Crew ...
languages.original_text: "Sort of." {n}Janris clears his throat, shuffling from foot to foot.{/n} "Sometimes they slip through the net because we don't have information from local wardens. Sometimes we're forced to... overlook an unsightly past for the sake of acquiring niche specialists. Even common smugglers, for instance, often turn out to be quite an asset on Ravor's crew..."
